website_summaries.verdict: This deliciously-scented formula goes on thick but keeps kids and adults burn-free.
pros: Non-nano zinc oxide formula with hints of citrus and vanilla
Beeswax, Vitamin E and sunflower oil base calms skin
cons: Thick consistency can be challenging to apply
Consider warming in your hands for easier application

customer_reviews.title: So good that it was stolen. Lol.
customer_reviews.text: I went to the park with my family and applied it on my two year old daughter. It was a hot day.. she went in the water and had a good time and even though I forgot to reapply I must say this sunscreen gave her amazing coverage for the rest of the evening. I forgot to put my badger sunscreen in my bag and when I came back it wasn’t there anymore! Someone liked it so much, they took it haha. It’s a good thing but not so good for me because I have to buy another one lol. But, It’s worth it because it’s organic, safe, and most importantly, EFFECTIVE! So thumbs up for BADGER! 👍🏽☀️
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Cruz

customer_reviews.title: I look like a pasty ghost after I put this on
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few sunscreens that I can wear without my skin reacting adversely and getting red after several hours' wear. That said, the opacity is difficult. I look like a pasty ghost after I put this on, even if I work hard at rubbing it in. If I ever tried to put this on without a mirror at hand, I think I would really look like I was trying to put on some kind of costume face paint. But, I'm giving it 5 stars anyway because I've come to the conclusion after trying over 17 different sunscreen brands that this just comes with the territory of being a non-nano mineral sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but NOT the price.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this sunscreen and use it every time I take the kids outside. I purchased this for my 5 year old and Twins (less than a year). Pros: This sunscreen smells absolutely amazing! Orange-vanilla scent. I was a tad bit worried about the scent and attracting pest but so far it has not attracted any pest, including bees. No chemical scent. A tiny pea size amount will allow me to cover my babies expose skin. No "holding" of the breath. Cons: A little on the thick side. Expensive in mine opinion for the size of the tube. Must be reapplied every 40 minutes and must be applied 20 minutes before going outside.
customer_reviews.author: A5hleyu

customer_reviews.title: Good product but requries more liberal application.
customer_reviews.text: This summer we used this Badger Balm product and their scent-free "sport" formulation. In fact we prefer the scent-free cream as it is more versatile-- the scent, though pleasant, can limit its applications. Pros: - Ingredients are simple and presumably safe. - Did not irritate kids' skin as some other sun-blocks have. - The unscented version can also double as a rash-cream, as it is a zinc-oxide paste. Cons: - Requires more liberal application to be effective. One family member developed a blistering sunburn on tips of ears before we realized this. - Costly. I expect we will use this product again next summer, mindful of the need to apply more of it, more frequently, to vulnerable areas.
customer_reviews.author: amazon_princessTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for us
customer_reviews.text: finally getting the chance to review. We bought this last year for our Bermuda trip. It did not work, b/c my son got burnt. Also, the lotion is very thick and very hard to wash off. It left a white crusty paste on the body where you apply the lotion.
customer_reviews.author: The McNamaras

customer_reviews.title: Smells sooo good
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen smells amazing, like an orange creamsicle. Does not spread easily, but honestly it's not supposed to. If a sunscreen spreads too easily, it probably has a lot of water on it. Only spread just enough for it to be an even layer, if you can't see it on the skin, it won't work. Badger is one of the best brands out there as far as safe, effective sunscreens for kids go.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Fresh energizing scent
customer_reviews.text: Product keeps my son protected from the sun and has a fresh energizing scent. It’s a little thick and can go on heavy but you can warm it up bit in your hands before putting on a thin layer. If you get in on too thick, it goes on white. You have to be careful not to get it on dark clothes. After researching other brands and ingredients, this seems to be the best product for children with good protection. Other products may go on clear but are not as good,
customer_reviews.author: B2

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies, too!
customer_reviews.text: Like other Badger products, I love this for my one year old. Yes, it is thicker and pasty...but it's natural and better for your children's skin! It leaves the skin a little greasy looking...but what sunscreen doesn't? If it isn't rubbed in, it will leave the skin looking white, but it will go away when rubbed in. We've been using this all summer long at the beach, pool, and on a boat, and my daughter has been fully protected from a sunburn! Our favorite part is the smell! Others have commented on it, too!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchin Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Tried to use this and had to dig into the ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use this and had to dig into the tube with a toothpick because the formula is so thick it wouldn't come out of the tube. Very thick to rub in as well. Used on my baby while out at the park and did protect his skin from sunburn.
customer_reviews.author: slowmotionaccident87

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, but works questionably
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and took it to Mexico with us on a beach vacation. We love the way it smells like a creamsicle and it goes on smoothly without feeling too greasy. It protected my 7 year old, but my 5 year old with fairer skin still got a little burned, so the jury is out on how well this works. I love that it is biodegradable and reef safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sunburnt and sad
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to use this sunscreen, but I was quickly let down. I was on the beach from 10-1 and quickly got sunburnt even when reapplying several times. It honestly feels and looks like it did absolutely nothing. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is super thick and somewhat greasy but it smells fantastic and I've never had it stain anything and it works and the ingredients are safe. Only thing is, you have to apply it, let it sit and then rub it in. But it doesn't come off in the water while you are waiting to rub it in, so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for our family :(
customer_reviews.text: I am so sad to give this a bad review. I really wanted a sunscreen not full of carcinogens for my daughter. My daughter, husband and I all have used this twice and got burnt both times. My husband is Hispanic and never gets burnt, it almost seemed like this made us less protected if that is even possible. Yesterday, we were in the sun for about 4 hours and I reapplied the sunscreen 3 times and we still got a sunburn. So, I would not recommend this product and I would try looking for a different "natural" sunscreen for your family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wont' buy again
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 2.5 stars. Yes it's one of the safer least toxic sunscreens according to EWG but i just dont like the consistency. It takes alot of elbow grease to rub it in and then you are still left with a very noticable white cast. Also, it it greasy and the smell to me is like a mix of synthetic and bug spray. The one positivie I can think of is that I feel the greasiness lends to it being more durable and water resistant while i'm in the pool. I will say it's not the worst of the "safe" sunscreens i've tried. To date, Trukid takes that honor, ever seen the movie "Powder"?
customer_reviews.author: kora

customer_reviews.title: Love the ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: This product gives me piece of mind when using on my 1 year old babe! The ingredients are great and it smells so good. I have not had trouble rubbing it in all the way, even on my squirmy toddler, and it does not leave the same white sheen that other natural sunscreens leave. I have not used this in water so I cannot speak to how well it holds up, but judging by the thickness I think it will hold up well as long as you follow the directions and reapply.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Cadatal

customer_reviews.title: Solid product w/o the crap ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Only down side is that it doesn’t come in a higher SPF. “They” say anything over 30 isn’t really protecting that high - I can see that. The 4 star rating is only because it needs to be reapplied a little more often than as indicated on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Grey Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and I like the ingredient list
customer_reviews.text: Great smell and I like the ingredient list. Leaves your skin somewhat white. My kids are a bit nuts and they like that. They think it is funny like a face paint which is fine with me. Keeps them extra protected. I'm not so keen about that myself but then again sometimes I don't really care either. It is a bit heavy for me also but again my kids don't mind. The smell is awesome though and maybe if we worked a bit harder at rubbing it in it would clear up but since they aren't bothered by it and have no complaints I don't bother. I would buy again. The container lasts a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: MommaCX3 ☀️❤️

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: The scent is yummy. The sun protection is great. It does feel heavy on the skin and made me feel greasy, but the white haze disappeared in less than 10 minutes. I don’t prefer to use this on my face, better for body. A little goes a long way! Wish it was cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: I have used this brand on my child for 4 years and when everyone else is suffering around her with a sunburn she is running arou
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to put anything on your toddler or child this is the stuff to put on to block out the sun. I have used this brand on my child for 4 years and when everyone else is suffering around her with a sunburn she is running around like a typical 4 year old enjoying it verses suffering with a sunburn. I use it too and LOVE IT! I would recommend this product to anyone nervous about what damage the sun can do to your child or yourself! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie R.

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite sunscreen to use on my kids (and myself)
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite sunscreen to use on my kids (and myself). I love the slightly sweet Tangerine and Vanilla scent and the consistency isn't quite as greasy as some of the others I have tried. It does go on pretty white, but eventually blends in if you continue to massage it into the skin. Seems to hold up in the water as long as we reapply every couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: It's great, doesn't burn or irritate in any way and smells good
customer_reviews.text: The only sunscreen that doesn't burn my eyes when I sweat, or otherwise irritate my skin. A little tough to spread when it's cold. I use primarily on my face, nose and ears. Kind of chalky looking but doesn't bother me at 50+ years old...
customer_reviews.author: Agave

customer_reviews.title: Safer for you, works great, smells even better!
customer_reviews.text: I bought badger brand after reviewing sunscreens on the EWG (environmental working group) website and finding that most of them rated a 10 for high levels of carcinogens. Badger rated 3 or under. Amazing! This one smells incredible.. like an orange creamsicle.The kids love it. It is a little tougher to rub in, but not bad. I don't mind spending an extra minute or so rubbing sun screen in, it's worth it to avoid nasty chemicals. I have very fair and freckled skin and this worked great for me applied twice and in the sun for 6 straight hours gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Merrewyn

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen out there
customer_reviews.text: It may go on a bit white but it is by far the best sunscreen out there for protection. Rates very well and safe. Goes on white but that can be rubbed between fingers first and put on. Smells like a cream-cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Kahuna101

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen for sweaty sports
customer_reviews.text: Badger is the best working sunscreen we have. We don't use it for everything, because it is hard to spread, but if we are going for a run on a sunny day, this is the one we reach for. It says that it is only waterproof for 40 minutes, but after an hour and a half of sweating in the sun, you still have to make an effort to get it off when you shower. This particular scent is fabulous - I wish I could find a body spray or cologne that smelled like this!
customer_reviews.author: hereswhatsgoingon

customer_reviews.title: Safest option for kids!
customer_reviews.text: We love Badger and it is all we have used on our kids since they were tiny (7 years)! The only thing we wish is that it was easier to rub in. We still look like ghosts after lots of rubbing it in. It does the job and it the safest option!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Mo

customer_reviews.title: Works well but if you have darker skin like I do you look like a ghost
customer_reviews.text: Works well but if you have darker skin like I do you look like a ghost. It doesn't rub in well but then again, I don't really care. It doesn't wash off easily. You still have to reapply as directed though or you will suffer the wrath of the sun. I put this on my first day of my Caribbean vacation this week and it worked well. No burns. I only spent an hour in the water but it wasn't that rough afternoon heat but closer to 4pm so even though I was tanned I didn't get burned. Wouldn't try that in the blazing sun though. You HAVE to reapply.
customer_reviews.author: Reese135

customer_reviews.title: Not enough protection
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good protection to take to Cancun, Mexico so that my kids, if only, would NOT get burned and be protected, but that didn’t happen! We ALL burned pretty bad! I can’t return this! So frustrating. I will NEVER purchase this item again and should have stuck to California Babies
customer_reviews.author: Gloria K.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...apply every 40 mins.
customer_reviews.text: You HAVE to apply every 40 mins or your child will get burnt. It is not fun to apply, you have to really rub it in or your child will walk around looking like a ghost. For the fact that I have to apply it so often I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: mommaoftwo

customer_reviews.title: I have finally found my favorite physical sunblock
customer_reviews.text: After a 2 year search, I have finally found my favorite physical sunblock. All the other ones I have found were super thick, sticky and horrible to blend in. This sunblock is obviously trickier than a traditional chemical sunblock (i.e. Coopertone, etc). But this is easy to rub in. My kids love the feel and smell. So happy to have found this sunblock.
customer_reviews.author: MarylandMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the safest sunscreen for children and I also purchased the one for baby. The smell is very nice and it’s very gentle on skin. It’s on the thicker side so spreading on kids isn’t always easy but I would rather use this safer sunscreen then something that is harmful .
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Naturally awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought another brand of natural sunscreen and one of my children was highly allergic to it. I was skeptical to try another natural sunscreen but the ingredients in this one differed a bit so I gave it a go. No sunburns, no complaints of it dripping in their eyes, and did what we needed! For a natural sunscreen, I am very pleased and I was happy with the price I got here on Amazon. I will buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Smells delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sunscreen. I bought it for a trip to an eco-park in Mexico where it was required to have instead of your typical, everyday sunscreen. This one in particular is friendly to the environment, which is what the park seeks out. I love that this travel-size bottle has plenty to go around and fits nicely in an airplane carry-on bag. Most of all, I absolutely love the scent :) Reminds me of a dreamsicle, my favorite! We actually used this for my husband and I but when we have kids someday, I'm sure we'll use this for them, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kita

customer_reviews.title: Awful to spread
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would try this for my trip to Hawaii. It does not spread well, finally gave up & shared my friends sunscreen. I usually use Blue Lizard sunscreen & love it. Immediately came home & bought a new bottle of the blue lizard.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Use for kids! Not adults.
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen was tried over a four day beach getaway with temps in the mid 80's. My little ones loved the smell but hated how "gloppy" it is. It is very thick and therefore you use a lot of it to cover a small space. It worked great for my kids but my husband hated it and his sunburn reflects that. Not good for body hair. Overall, it served great as kids sunscreen, but wouldn't suggest it for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like creamsicle
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen smells great and is our choice of sunscreen if we are not swimming. Because of the smell though I did find my two year old trying to eat it, I tasted it as well just to make sure he was gonna be fine and taste like nothing, doesn’t taste toxic like regular sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D

customer_reviews.title: Won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.text: Not completly satisfied. I had high hopes. One of my children has fair skin. We reapplied every 45 minutes to an hour, she got horribly burned. My other child, olive complection. Same applications and she too burned badly, which never happens... I was dissapointed to say the least. 3⭐ because of the natural aspect of it. Not chemical laden.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMichelle81

customer_reviews.title: No rashes here!
customer_reviews.text: I have three kids with weirdly sensitive skin and finding one sunscreen that worked for all three was difficult. With allergies to most major brands in the box stores, I did some research on the ewg website and ordered a tube of badger and think baby sunscreens. This was the winner! I don't hate the smell, but it does make them smell like orange cream push up pops and can be overwhelming on your 6th application of the day. But nobody has had a rash and we are on tube three this summer. Win!
customer_reviews.author: melissab

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sunscreen! I never get burned anymore and it smells so good! It does leave a white film on (that's how it blocks the sun) so be aware of that when buying.
customer_reviews.author: Aubree Christian

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful and no harsh chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Wish it would run in better but it’s great for the skin and doesn’t have the harsh chemicals. They do have one that has a skin tint to it but the slight white color isn’t too bad. Great for babies skin and smells WONDERFUL!!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Moerkerke

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had noticed this had a scent. It attracts bugs. It doesn't spread very well either. Also made my daughter have an eczema flair up
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Goes on well, smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it is not tested on animals, has no nasty chemicals, does not harm the oceans, works and smells really lovely. I use on my face and it dries without being too greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sun Protection, Safe for Multiple Daily Use, Amazing Scent
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen provides great protection especially since we live in sunny CA. But my favorite part is that it smells like a creamsicle. And because of its scent my 4 yr old cannot wait to put it on and wants to put it on himself. No more fighting him to put it on! It is thick and does leave that white coating especially after getting wet but believe that is the cost of such great sun protection. And because it has such a great EWG rating, I feel comfortable putting it on my children 2+ times per day every day.
customer_reviews.author: EMs

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best sun screen I have ever used on my daughter. Great protection for hours. I do reapply as needed but she has not gotten burned once. Also the ingredients were key for my purchase. Non-nano zinc is better for you and this product is non-nano!!! Sold me and I will buy more!!
customer_reviews.author: L.Lohrey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff WORKS. Me and my kids put it on and we're swimming for over an hour in direct sun, then played in the shade. Nobody got so much as a tan line. I am dark but my youngest -age 2- is very pale. She usually gets a little burn, even with sunscreen. But I'm happy that she got nothing, no burns! It does go on pasty and takes a lot of rubbing in, but it works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: This isn’t as good as the baby badger
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t as good as the baby badger. Not sure why but the baby sunblock is much better. It smells nice but that’s about it. My son came back from soccer with pink arms.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nikiforuk

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: I love the thickness of this sunscreen - we don't end up using as much and it covers for much longer than the drug store brands. We have been using the same tube for a family of 6 all summer long.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Went on easy and protected all my children from the sun. I love the scent and so did they! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells so good, like an orange dreamsicle
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells so good, like an orange dreamsicle. I do think that the bugs also enjoy the smell, so it might not be the best option for some places. Like all mineral sunscreens, it can be a little tough to rub in, but it works well and is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Chrobak

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is a little thick but works really well! My very fair-skinned kids have not gotten burned yet! I put it on them in the morning and the again in the afternoon and they are good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good protection when swimming. A little thick, but manageable. I like the ingredients, and that this product is not toxic like so many are.
customer_reviews.author: Ann O

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: You know what spot you've missed when you're putting this stuff on. It's thick & bright white. Good for putting on a toddler & up. My 3yr old likes to put it on because it's like he's playing with paint. My 1yr old hates it though because we have to hold him still while we're putting it on him. All & all it's worth the extra time to spread it on your kids skin. None of the harmful chemicals that many of the other sunscreens contain in them.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Caruthers

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have used the lavender scented badger Balm for years and now I have a new favorite scent. This one smells great and works just as well as the lavender. The only think I find less-than-perfect is the very thick consistency which makes it a bit harder to spread than most sunscreen lotions. My solution is to leave it in my car for use there. It's the perfect consistency after it bakes in the hot car for a while. The sunscreen is also a bit chalky looking on my skin but this is a tradeoff since it is aphysical sun blocking agent. Overall it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Hollyton

customer_reviews.title: We love this sunblock!
customer_reviews.text: We used the whole container over this summer for my 4 and 3 year old who were out in the sun often swimming. It works so well and they never got burnt with this sunblock on. I did reapply especially to their faces after an hour or two.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: This smells so good I want to eat it. I was looking for an organic sunscreen that was safe for my kids and the environment. I found it. This is a little on the thick side, but I don’t mind that. It covers well and does a great job. I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Works well and smells great
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the scent and I like that it works!

customer_reviews.title: While I loved the idea of this sunscreen

customer_reviews.title: Strong orange scent

customer_reviews.author: Kathy Cox

customer_reviews.text: Used on my toddler all week in Cancun. While the adults used different a sunblock and burned, my toddler was perfectly sunburn free. The only downside is that it is a little hard to spread on the skin but worth it to keep your little ones safe.

customer_reviews.author: Norallia

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smells great!
customer_reviews.text: We love this stuff. I buy a couple tubes every summer for different bags so I always have it.
customer_reviews.author: GLane

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen. Will never go back to that cruddy store stuff. Used on my newbie all summer, not one sunburn. We go out to the lake often, applied once or twice & he was never burnt. Used on my face & older kiddoes faces.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: We've been through several natural/baby sunscreens looking for one that doesn't irritate my daughter's eczema. This is it! It's thick and needs to be applied more often than other brands but the only one that doesn't leave her broken out in huge red irritated rashes.
customer_reviews.author: L. S.

customer_reviews.title: four star
customer_reviews.text: It's really hard to wipe uniformity, but it smells good. Easy to wash away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To people who have problems...
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I was sensitive to chemical sunscreens on my face. I also didn't like the silicone feel of chemical sunscreens. Very good physical sunscreen. Moisturizing and full of good ingredients too. I reccomend you put on two thin layers than just one big thick one. Also to remove it use OCM+washcloth/damp cotton pad because the product has an oil base. Only oil can remove oil. Cold cream works pretty well too.You can't remove oil with water. Since the product is a physical sunscreen and non-nano, you can't really avoid the white cast but I'd imagine people with darker skintones having a hard time.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Safe and effective
customer_reviews.text: Was very hesitant about spending $13 on this tube of sunscreen. But I have a very fair skin child who had no skin reactions and did not get burnt at all this summer. So I am a fan.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, hard to spread
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and decent price. However it’s super thick and no amount a rubbing it in prevents a slight white residue on skin. And it needs to be reapplied often to really work.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. Goes on a little thick
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Goes on a little thick, but that's the point. Put it on the kid in the morning before camp and sh's pretty good for most of the day. HAsn't burned yet. This is safer than a lot of the alternatives out there and effective as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bitterpete

customer_reviews.title: Love the tangerine smell especially during a hot summer day
customer_reviews.text: Love the tangerine smell especially during a hot summer day. It’s creamy but not sticky. Overall a great product.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend Badger Balm SPF 30 Kids Sunscreen Cream!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen! The tube is a good size for stuffing into the back pack and for on the go! The cream is thick but it's easy to apply and I was able to rub it all the way in if necessary. Sometimes, I also just left it on him with a pale white film, but he didn't care and I didn't as long as he was protected from the sun. I don't remember what I paid for it but I think it was reasonable. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: smells nice, but badger sport lasts much longer
customer_reviews.text: i bought this because my kids hated the scent of the badger sport. however, i didn't realize this kids sunblock is water resistant for only 40 minutes, vs the 80mins of the sport version, so they had to re-apply twice as often. i'll go back to the sport version, as i would like to save some time applying sunscreen to 3 kids
customer_reviews.author: engk916

customer_reviews.title: Good job
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a more natural sunscreen. Less chemicals. I try to research a lot of products before I use them on my kids. I read that zinc sunscreen was a better option. I came across this one and read the reviews. It smells great, my kids love the scent. As other reviewers stated, it does leave a "film" on the skin but you can really rub it in or it eventually goes away. I kind of like it because I can see where I missed.. However, my kids are still getting red even using it, so that is why I took one star off. But otherwise, I like the product.

customer_reviews.title: So thick and difficult to put on. doesn't spread ...

customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! This is the BEST sunscreen ever!! It smells nice and refreshing. It's a light scent so it's not overwhelming. This is now our go-to sunscreen!

customer_reviews.text: We love this sunscreen. It definitely does a great job protecting my little ones skin from burning. It is a bit hard to spread, but I would say that's the only con

customer_reviews.title: We have used Blue Lizard for years but saw good reviews for this so thought we'd try it
customer_reviews.text: We have used Blue Lizard for years but saw good reviews for this so thought we'd try it. I've been very happy so far. It has a nice smell which the kids like, and is less greasy and heavy feeling than other mineral-based sunscreens. Very easy to spread and rub in. We also use a Badger stick on the faces because that just seems to stay put better. Just wish it came in a bulk size dispenser like Blue Lizard does...it would be much more economical.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Our go to!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this item several times for my toddlers and have always been really pleased with it. It has a soft and natural orange/vanilla scent instead of a sunscreen odor. It's thick but very easy to rub in and they've never burned when they have this on.

Kids love the light tangerine & vanilla scent, like a creamsicle, so it's easy to apply. Reef safe, biodegradable, broad spectrum, and water resistant for at least 40 minutes this kids sunscreen is perfect for the beach, pool, and light activities. Just 7 simple ingredients: non-nano zinc oxide, organic sunflower oil, organic beeswax, organic orange oil, organic tangerine oil, sunflower vitamin e, organic seabuckthorn & organic vanilla provide safe and effective broad-spectrum protection. Gluten-free and hypoallergenic with sunflower oil as its base for easy application. 98% organic sunscreen ingredients.
feature_bullets: SIMPLY THE SAFEST SUNSCREEN FOR KIDS - Badger sets the standard for simple safe kids sunscreen lotions that protect your whole family. This broad spectrum mineral sunscreen has only 7 simple ingredients: non-nano zinc oxide, organic sunflower oil, organic beeswax, organic orange oil, organic tangerine oil, sunflower vitamin e, organic seabuckthorn & organic vanilla. This gluten-free, hypoallergenic, all-natural kids sunscreen is perfect for your child's sensitive skin.

PROTECTS WITH THE MINERAL ZINC OXIDE - Badger’s SPF 30 Kids Sunscreen Cream uses our original non-nano, large particle zinc oxide. This mineral stays on top of your kid's skin, scattering and absorbing UVA & UVB rays, and won’t absorb into their bloodstream. Naturally water and sweat resistant for at least 40 minutes it's perfect for the beach, pool, and light activities. Kids love the light tangerine & vanilla scent, like a creamsicle, so it's easy to apply.

REEF SAFE SUNSCREEN - Safe for coral means safe for your kids too! Badger sunscreens are made without oxybenzone or any chemicals shown to harm coral or humans. All Badger sunscreen lotions and creams are top rated for safety and efficacy by the EWG sunscreen guide. This eco-friendly biodegradable mineral sunscreen protects you without endangering marine life.

98% ORGANIC INGREDIENTS FOR HEALTHY SKIN - The certified organic sunscreen base ingredients are antioxidant rich, ultra-moisturizing, and great for your kid's skin. Non-GMO and contains no dyes, parabens, or other artificial ingredients. Healthy botanical ingredients promote healthy skin for your children.

A BRAND YOU CAN TRUST - Badger is a family owned, women run B Corporation (Benefit Corp) making mineral kids sunscreens and other organic skin care products that we use on our own children in rural New Hampshire since 1995. We are the leaders in safe natural sunscreens. Don't just take our word for it, read our ingredients, see what others say about Badger sunscreens, and try them for yourself.
